The output is either drawn to the screen or captured as a texture. More info See in Glossary types in the Universal Render Pipeline A series of operations that take the contents of a Scene, and displays them on a screen. Unity lets you choose from pre-built render pipelines, or write your own. More info See in Glossary (URP).
